C3: restricted action on the set $S$ using the given tex-label.
induced action on $k$ dimensional subspaces
induced action on $k$ subsets.
action on the exterior square
Action on the codes of $H$ in the given group. $H$ must be a subgroup of the given group.
Create the subgroup of special matrices.
Create the subgroup of even permutations.
Create the derived subgroup.
Create the subgroup which stabilizes pt.
Create the subgroup which stabilizes the given set. Requires a poset classification control object to generate the orbits on subsets.
Create the projectivity subgroup of a semilinear group.
Create the subfield subgroup w.r.t. $\bbF_s$. Here $k = \frac{q-1}{s-1}$.
Create the action on the group itself by right multiplication.
Create the direct product action of the two actions given in list (comma separated). Then create the subgroup of the given order from the given generators.
Create the polarity extension of G0. P is the underlying projective space on which G0 acts.
Create the automorphism group of the input group (which is given in \verb'-from'). This command requires Magma.

Create the representative of the $i$-th conjugacy class of subgroups in the lattice of subgroups. The conjugacy classes of subgroups must have been computed before using the group theoretic activity \verb'-subgroup_lattice_magma'. A shortened base will be computed for the subgroup. The shortened base contains only those base points for which the basic orbit is non-trivial. See Section~\ref{sec:lineargroups:advanced:topics}.
Create the stabilizer of the given variety.
Nauty options, see Table~\ref{tab:nauty:control}.
Specify the input group action (this option can be repeated).
